__e: He tells the most wonderful darky stories and he'II just do anything to get them to talk to him.
Well, I said I might meet some people at this thing downtown, but it sounded like it'll be pretty heavy on Negroes and jazz, so --
I have this story about this crazy night I had, where I ended up in Jersey city with all these negroes, and we all got along, can you imagine how good that story is?
